title: Wherever such zone is proposed in sanctioned Regional Plan, provisions related to such zone will continue to that extent
clause_text: Wherever such zone is proposed in sanctioned Regional Plan, provisions related to such zone will continue to that extent. Development around Tarapur Atomic Power Station in Tarapur - Boisar Area
section: Residential Zone with payment of Premium
